definition: Evaluation at the end of a learning period to measure achievement against standards

positive_examples: The final exam covers everything from the entire semester.
Your grade on this project determines whether you pass the course.
The end-of-unit test measures mastery of the learning objectives.
Standardized tests provide summative data on student achievement.
negative_examples: Let me see how you're doing so far - don't worry, this doesn't count.
Quick quiz to see if we need to review before moving on.
Show me your thinking process, not just the final answer.
